body:
<!--e57a25ab6845829454e8d69fc972939a-->

The following sections might be updated with supplementary metadata relevant to reviewers and maintainers.

<!--174a7506f384e20aa4161008e828411d-->
### Conflicts
Reviewers, this pull request conflicts with the following ones:

* #20122 (Make Assert(â¦) usable in all contexts. Make implicit assumptions explicit. by practicalswift)
* #20054 (Remove confusing and useless "unexpected version" warning by MarcoFalke)
* #20017 (rpc: Add RPCContext by promag)
* #19937 (signet mining utility by ajtowns)
* #19911 (net: guard vRecvGetData with cs_vRecv and orphan_work_set with g_cs_orphans by narula)
* #19910 (net processing: Move peer_map to PeerManager by jnewbery)
* #19905 (Remove dead CheckForkWarningConditionsOnNewFork by MarcoFalke)
* #19901 (Avoid locking CTxMemPool::cs recursively in CTxMemPool::DynamicMemoryUsage() by hebasto)
* #19858 (Periodically make block-relay connections and sync headers by sdaftuar)
* #19843 (Refactoring and minor improvement for self-advertisements by naumenkogs)
* #19829 (net processing: Move block inventory state to net_processing by jnewbery)
* #19806 (validation: UTXO snapshot activation by jamesob)
* #19594 (refactor: Make mapBlocksUnknownParent local, and rename it by hebasto)
* #19573 (Replace unused BIP 9 logic with draft BIP 8 by luke-jr)
* #19461 (multiprocess: Add bitcoin-gui -ipcconnect option by ryanofsky)
* #19460 (multiprocess: Add bitcoin-wallet -ipcconnect option by ryanofsky)
* #19425 (refactor: Get rid of more redundant chain methods by ryanofsky)
* #19259 (tests: Add fuzzing harness for LoadMempool(...) and DumpMempool(...) by practicalswift)
* #18766 (Disable fee estimation in blocksonly mode (by removing the fee estimates global) by darosior)
* #18731 (refactor: Make CCheckQueue RAII-styled by hebasto)
* #18710 (Add local thread pool to CCheckQueue by hebasto)
* #18354 (Use shared pointers only in validation interface by bvbfan)
* #16981 (Improve runtime performance of --reindex by LarryRuane)
* #16333 (test: Set BIP34Height = 2 for regtest by MarcoFalke)
* #15719 (Wallet passive startup by ryanofsky)
* #10443 (Add fee_est tool for debugging fee estimation code by ryanofsky)
* #10102 ([experimental] Multiprocess bitcoin by ryanofsky)

If you consider this pull request important, please also help to review the conflicting pull requests. Ideally, start with the one that should be merged first.
